name: All Patched Up
description:
All Patched Up is an adventure platforming  game about a patchwork doll, Tack, leaving their dismal home behind, and meeting plush pals that can help them traverse the needle-infested environment. Use their abilities to reach the goal!

Fluff, the springy fox can bounce you up to high places!

Waxen, the trusty little elephant can put out fires!

Minky, the darling pink dragon, is waiting for you at the end!

Controls: 

Jump - W/SPACEBAR

Move - "A" & "D"

Ready Fluff's super-bounce - Num 1

Waxen's water spray - Num 2


Credits:

Art: Jacob Raymond, Mackenzie Box, Jace Scott

Programming: Zion Matthews, Brionna Franklin

Music/Audio: Brandon Johnson

This was a game made for our 2019-2021 Major Production at AIE Lafayette.
Developed in Unreal Engine 4.23.1
